p: Therefore, Asaad et al. ( 2019) recommended the need to design educational courses on new emerging diseases and improve students' cognitive and awareness. More recently, the results of the CDC Center (2020) and Singh et al. ( 2017) recommended the importance of education, teacher, and higher education efforts to reduce the spread of the COVID‐19 by providing them with healthy health information and to reduce the stigma associated with COVID‐19.
